message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm the better negotiator!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I can see it!
I'm still willing to compromise, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're not getting any more generous, are you?
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a middle ground.

This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, and don't expect a better deal!
I'm making one last attempt to find a fair deal. Let's try to make a compromise.
This is my last chance to make a deal. I'm taking 90% of the money, the rest is yours. It's take it or leave it!
